name: Manhattan's Last Hope Saves Manhattan
description:
I made this in 2 hours for a MLH gamejam on poppenkast, my brother Seb (ultimate walrus) made the music i think??? around sophomore year of highschool maybe

The fish with legs is Manhattan's Last Hope (he does not have a shorter name) and I still draw him sometimes because he makes me laugh- made some really nice sprites of him for a fighting game a couple years back!!! the weirdest thing by far was the stage play i had to write for class with him in class about an exploding sandwich, complete with props

this game is: balls bustingly hard, but still kinda fun. i'll upload the sequel in a seq- it's unfinished, but thrugh the roof more polished!!
